name: Candy "Fake"
description:
Candy fake is a very simple match-3 game that I made for my school project. I develop it by using Qt Creator. I done with it but I want to share the source code so everyone can play or change it whatever they want.

You can get the source code from:

https://github.com/DrMinh/fakecandy

Or download the installer via the button bellow.

Feature:

- Select two candys to switch space. If you the same candy make a straight line, player get +point.

- Biscuit: only be destroy if nearby candy get destroy 2 time. When biscuit get destroyed, player get + 3 seconds.

- Bom: after three turn, it destroy nearby object include biscuit.

--------------------------------

You can find game asset here: https://opengameart.org/content/candy-match-3
